law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 199, effective July 13, 1984. -- Repealed and reenacted 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 105, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 5.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Imposition of additional tax -- Implementation and collection.
